channel.title: Profiles on Johnny Bilotta | Digital Product Designer
channel.description: Recent content in Profiles on Johnny Bilotta | Digital Product Designer

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Johnny! First, thank you for visiting my site. No matter what brought you here, I appreciate your time and interest in who I am and what I do. I am a digital product designer and front-end developer operating out of Philadelphia. My professional career began during the mid-90s. I started out as a graphic designer, in advertising, after attending The Art Institute of Philadelphia where I studied industrial and product design.

item.title: Racekrafts
item.description: Achievements Some of my more notable awards I have received during my career.
